response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is worth $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
